query: Could you assist in creating a 7-day travel itinerary, commencing on March 9th and concluding on March 15th, 2022, for two people? The trip should start from Detroit, and we plan to visit three separate cities in Missouri. Our travel budget amounts to $5,300. When it comes to accommodations, we prefer private rooms. We are eager to sample a variety of cuisines, including Chinese, Mediterranean, Mexican, and Indian. Note that we will not be self-driving and will rely on local transportation options.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Kansas City,Fort Leonard Wood,St. Louis]
